dashboard.noActionsDescription: No actions have been assigned to users during this period.
dashboard.noRiskDataDescription: Events in various risk levels will be displayed when data is available.
dashboard.noIdentityRiskDescription: No critical, high, medium, or low identity risk events occurred during this period.
dashboard.noGeozoneRiskDescription: No events occurred in specified or learned geozones during this period.
dashboard.noLatestEventsDescription: Latest events will be displayed for the specified period (hourly or daily) when data is available.

common.appAnomalyRiskScoreAtRisk: At risk. {{score}}% app anomaly risk score. App usage is inconsistent with past behavior.
common.appAnomalyRiskScoreSafe: Safe. {{score}}% app anomaly risk score. App usage is consistent with past behavior.
common.networkAnomalyRiskScoreAtRisk: At risk. {{score}}% network anomaly risk score. Network usage is inconsistent with past behavior.
common.networkAnomalyRiskScoreSafe: Safe. {{score}}% network anomaly risk score. Network usage is consistent with past behavior.

common.title: BlackBerry Persona Analytics
common.name: Name
common.nameInvalid: The name must be {{max}} characters or less.
common.descriptionInvalid: The description must be {{max}} characters or less.
common.errorPleaseRetry: An error was encountered. Please try again.
common.assessmentOfRiskBasedOnUserTypicalActivi: Assessment of risk based on the user's typical activities.
common.assessmentOfRiskBasedOnUserProximity: Assessment of risk based on the user's proximity to learned locations or defined geozones.

ipAddressMapping.untrusted: Untrusted. IP address matches a configured untrusted IP address.
ipAddressMapping.undefined: Undefined. IP address is not trusted or untrusted.
ipAddressMapping.undetected: Undetected. IP address is not detected.
ipAddressMapping.trusted: Trusted. IP address matches a configured trusted IP address.

actions.disabledInPassiveMode: Actions are disabled in passive mode
actions.dynamicsAppsDisallow: Do not allow BlackBerry Dynamics apps to run
actions.dynamicsAppsAllow: Allow BlackBerry Dynamics apps to run

actions.assignedActionAppsWithScoreRequest: Assigned action for apps that sent a scoring request

map.label: Label
map.streetViewErrorRadius: No street view is available within {{radius}} meters.
map.streetViewErrorUnknown: Unable to display street view due to an unknown map server error.

privacy.protectUserPrivacy: Protect user privacy by obfuscating users' location information.
privacy.confirmDisablePrivacyTitle: Do you want to disable privacy mode?
privacy.confirmDisablePrivacyNote: If you disable privacy mode, BlackBerry Persona Analytics administrators in your organization will be able to view users' current and past locations.

general.title: General settings
general.operatingModeInfo: Specify an operating mode. Passive mode is used to collect data and builds risk models and learned locations for individual users without taking any action. In Active mode the actions specified in policies are enforced.
general.dataRetentionInfo: Specify how long data collected by BlackBerry Persona Analytics is stored.
general.dataRetentionInvalid: The data retention period must be a whole number from 1 to 30.

riskEngines.title: Risk engines
riskEngines.sectionTitle: Specify the risk factors that will be available in BlackBerry Persona Analytics policies in your UEM instance. When a risk factor is enabled, you specify the actions that are applied to devices in a BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy.
riskEngines.definedGeozoneText: Specify whether defined geozones are enabled. You can define geozones in Settings in the BlackBerry Persona Analytics portal. After you define geozones, you specify the actions that are applied when users are in a specific geozone in a BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy. You can also specify actions for users that are not in a defined geozone.
riskEngines.learnedGeozoneText: Specify whether learned geozones are enabled. The BlackBerry Persona Analytics services process event and location data from apps to learn about the geographical locations (geozones) that are typical for each user. You specify the actions that are applied based on a user's proximity to a learned geozone in a BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy.
riskEngines.learnedGeozoneDistanceMoreThan: More than {{valueOuterField}} $t(common.unit.{{unitOuterField}}) from a learned location
riskEngines.learnedGeozoneMediumRiskDistanceInvalid: The medium-risk radius must be greater than the low-risk radius.
riskEngines.learnedGeozoneLowRiskDistanceInvalid: The low-risk radius must be less than the medium-risk radius.
riskEngines.learnedGeozoneLowRiskRadiusInvalid: The low-risk radius must be a whole number from 1 to 20000.
riskEngines.learnedGeozoneMediumRiskRadiusInvalid: The medium-risk radius must be a whole number from 1 to 20000.
riskEngines.continuousAuthRiskText: Specify whether continuous authentication is enabled. BlackBerry Persona Analytics services calculate a user's risk level based on data about a user's typical BlackBerry Dynamics app usage patterns. You specify the actions that are applied when a user's app usage is not consistent with their typical patterns in a BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy.
riskEngines.continuousAuthRiskWithAnomalyText: Specify whether users' app usage is compared with previous usage patterns to detect anomalies.
riskEngines.continuousAuthRiskFactorText: At risk. App usage not consistent with past behavior
riskEngines.behavioralPatternText: Specify whether behavioral risk factors are enabled. BlackBerry Persona Analytics services calculate a user's behavioral risk level based on contextual and behavioral data from BlackBerry Enterprise Identity and BlackBerry Dynamics apps. You can specify the actions that are applied based on a user's behavioral risk score in a BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy.
riskEngines.ipAddressText: Specify whether IP address risk factors are enabled. If IP address risk factors are enabled, you must configure trusted and untrusted IP addresses in Settings. Trusted IP addresses are automatically treated as low risk, and untrusted IP addresses are treated as critical risk. You can specify the risk levels that are applied for undefined and undetected IP addresses.
riskEngines.ipAddressLink: Configure trusted and untrusted IP addresses
riskEngines.networkAnomalyText: Specify whether users' network usage is compared with previous usage patterns to detect anomalies.
riskEngines.networkAnomalyRiskFactorText: At risk. Network usage not consistent with past behavior

ipAddress.title: IP address configuration
ipAddress.trustedDescription: Specify the IP addresses to be trusted and lower user's risk score. An IP address or range can be entered on a new line.
ipAddress.untrustedDescription: Specify the IP addresses to be untrusted. Untrusted IP addresses will be mapped to critical risk level.
ipAddress.trustedListInfo: Add trusted IP addresses. IP addresses that are in a trusted list are treated as low risk. You can add discrete IP addresses, IP address ranges, or use CIDR notation to include subnets.
ipAddress.untrustedListInfo: Add untrusted IP addresses. IP addresses that are in an untrusted list are treated as critical risk. You can add discrete IP addresses, IP address ranges, or use CIDR notation to include subnets.
ipAddress.confirmDelete: Do you want to delete the selected IP addresses?
ipAddress.invalidFormat: The format of one or more IP addresses is invalid
ipAddress.errorAddNew: Unable to create new IP Address List
ipAddress.errorUpdate: Unable to update IP Address List

policies.title: BlackBerry Persona policies
policies.confirmDeletePolicies: Do you want to delete the selected policies?
policies.confirmDeletePolicy: <0>Do you want to delete the <1>{{policy}}</1> policy? {{applied}}</0>
policies.deleteUserOrGroupIconBtn: Delete user or group icon button

details.title: BlackBerry Persona policy
details.selectTrustedIpAddress: Select at least one trusted IP address
details.selectUntrustedIpAddress: Select at least one untrusted IP address
details.betweenRadiusLearnedGeozone: Between {{innerRadius.value}} $t(common.unit.{{innerRadius.unit}}) - {{outerRadius.value}} $t(common.unit.{{outerRadius.unit}}) away from a learned geozone.
details.moreThanRadiusLearnedGeozone: More than {{outerRadius.value}} $t(common.unit.{{outerRadius.unit}}) away from a learned geozone.
details.anyRiskLevelGeozone: Any {{level}} risk geozone configured in geozone settings.
details.blockInitiatedDynamicsAppAction: Block the BlackBerry Dynamics app that initiated the request
details.addCustomActionRiskFactors: Add custom actions for the enabled risk factors. If you want to allow users to re-authenticate to reduce their identity risk level, turn on automatic risk reduction.
details.addCustomActionGeozones: Add custom actions for learned and defined geozones. Custom risk level risk factors will take precedence over the default risk levels.
details.assignActionBlockAll: When a user is detected with the risk factors, block all BlackBerry Dynamics apps from all of the user's activated devices in UEM. Users cannot unblock the apps. The apps will be unblocked when the detected risk factor is no longer present.
details.assignActionBlockRequsted: When a user is detected with the risk factors, block only the BlackBerry Dynamics app that initiated the request (from that device). The app will be unblocked when the risk factor is no longer present.
details.addCustomActionsDefinedGeozones: Add custom actions for defined geozones
details.removeCustomActionsDefinedGeozones: Remove custom actions for the defined geozone
details.userInUndefinedGeozone: User is not in a defined geozone.
details.configureAutoRiskReductionTitle: Allow users to re-authenticate to reduce their identity risk level.
details.appliedListHeader: Search for users or groups to add to the policy.
details.appliedDialogTitle: Add a user or group to {{policyName}}
details.appliedDialogDescription: Search for users or groups in UEM. You can assign multiple users and groups to the same policy. To find a group, enter at least the first three characters in the group name.
details.deleteAppliedConfirm: Do you want to remove {{users}} users and {{groups}} groups from {{policyName}}?
details.identityRiskFactorsNotSupportedAlert: Identity risk factors for critical risk are not supported at this time. Additional risk factors will be available in a future update.
details.gracePeriodInvalid: The grace period must be a whole number from 1 to 480.
details.gracePeriodLockWorkspace: When a user is detected with the risk factors, lock the Android Enterprise work profile. This setting applies only to Android Enterprise devices.
details.gracePeriodLockWorkspaceTooltip: Specify, in minutes, how much time must elapse after the workspace is unlocked before another command to lock the workspace can be sent.
details.gracePeriodLockDevice: When a user is detected with the risk factors, lock the device. This setting applies to all device types.
details.gracePeriodLockDeviceTooltip: Specify, in minutes, how much time must elapse after the device is unlocked before another command to lock the device can be sent.
details.disableWorkspace: When a user is detected with the risk factors, disable the Android Enterprise work profile. This setting applies only to Android Enterprise devices.
details.noRiskFactors: Before you create or edit a policy, you must enable at least one risk factor.

create.title: Add a BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy
create.successDescription: Would you like to assign users or groups to this BlackBerry Persona Analytics policy?

rank.title: Rank BlackBerry Persona policies
rank.description: BlackBerry UEM uses the ranking that you specify to resolve any BlackBerry Persona policies.
